name: Queens + Monsters Eau de Parfum with Sandalwood + Vanilla
about: Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Warm Woods..Key Notes: Neroli, Freesia, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Best described as a floral vanilla perfume, Queens + Monsters features key notes of neroli, freesia, and sandalwood for a warm, unexpected and gourmand composition...About the Bottle: Henry Rose crafted their bottles to be genderless, modern, and minimal. Their 50ml bottles are made from 90% recycled glass,  caps are made from fully compostable soy resin, and cartons are made from biodegradable FSC hemp paper...About the Fragrance:  “The idea was to create a concentrated woody fragrance that still showed a very fluid and multifaceted identity. It is a game of contrasts between brightness and sensuality, a dialog between the sparkling, zesty freshness of the petitgrain and the creamy, milky facet of the sandalwood.” - Pascal Gaurin perfumer..All Henry Rose fragrances are EWG Verified, Cradle to Cradle Certified, and Leaping Bunny Certified Cruelty-Free...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat.,Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Methyldihydrojasmonate,  3,3-Dimethyl-5-(2,2,3-Timethyl-3-Cyclopenten-1-yl)-4-Penten-2-ol, Ethylene Brassylate, 2-Ethyl-4-(2,2,3-Trimethyl-3-Cyclopenten-1-yl)-2-Buten-1-ol, Pentamethylcyclopent-3-Ene-Butanol 1-Propanol,2-[1-(3,3-Dimethylcyclohexyl)Ethoxy]-2-Methyl-Propanoate, Dodecahydro-3a,6,6,9a-Tetramethylnaphtho(2,1-b)Furan, Vanillin, Ethyl Vanillin, Methylcyclopentadecenone, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Tetrahydro-Methyl-Methylpropyl)-Pyran-4-ol, Linalool, Propanedioic Acid,1-(3,3-Dimethylcyclohexyl)Ethyl Ethyl Ester, Linalyl Acetate, Phenylisohexanol, Gamma-Octalactone, 2-Acetonaphthone, Gamma-Nonalactone, Ethyl Hydroxypyrone Cyclopropanemethanol, 1-Methyl-2-[(1,2,2-Timethylbicyclo[3.1.0]Hex-3-yl)Methyl], 4-Methyl-3-Decen-5-ol, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Spray onto wrists and neck to intensify fragrance with the warmth of your body. .-Henry Rose fine fragrances can be worn alone or layered  to create a personalized, signature scent....Recycling Instructions:.-Outer carton is made from FSC hemp paper and is compostable and recyclable.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is very nice but the bottle came already about 1/4 empty. I just received this and Dark was Night today and they’re noticeably missing quite a lot. For $48 I’d expect it to be full!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent it’s light and sweet and long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy and boy was it a mistake. Not for me. Smells like a must old attic to me. I didn't get Vanilla or Sandalwood. No thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be so honest... this smells like an Indian restaurant in the nicest way possible. I got it in the sephora favorites set. It just smells.. spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW got this as a sample & I absolutely love it!! Will be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love fragrance but I'm terrible at describing them so look to the other five star reviews because I agree with all of them!

reviews.review_title: VERY close to a 5 from me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: So what is awesome about this amazing scent :  complex top and middle notes.  Overall decent to good dry down.  She's clean and oh so strong.  A beautiful vanilla.  Very gourmand indeed, and I love that.  A sophistocated gourmand at that.   BUT one star off because once this dries down, it becomes a little boring, and frankly, I know a much better vanilla that is a lot like this one that is also clean and strong and never boring (Commodity Gold Bold).  When Queens dries down, she's a powdery cocoa vanilla, then a powdery brown sugar.  Also, this is weak on the woods note.  It is heavily powder gourmand.  So, to me, this is really close to being fabulous, but it just doesn't make the cut.  So close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It opens really bright & dries down after a few minutes. It is very woody and perfect for everyone. The sandalwood is the star of the show. It's slightly floral, but predominantly woody with a slight smokey note. It gives off like a sophisticated bohemian vibe in the absolute best way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a garden party at your doorstep that does not veer into the nauseous impact of roses and cakes. This smells like a breeze of fresh air and elegance with the continuous white flower note. It fits any types of casual occasions, when you want to have fun, and relax while at it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my friend as a travel size, and he loved it so much the next year he asked for it again as his birthday present.  He gets many compliments on it and smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received a sample with my latest purchase and i love this and will purchase! it's giving Byredo Mojave Ghost vibes to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a beautiful scent! It says genderless in the description, however I feel very feminine wearing it. It somewhat reminds me of Ormonde Jayne's Ormonde Woman. it's heady, yet clean, woody yet bordering on gourmand without being sweet. It's rather lovely. And, as a note, I absolutely despise vanilla in perfumes and most gourmands, but I didn't notice the note mentioned in the description somehow, and went ahead and purchased it. I'm so glad I did - it's very well-balanced and well-blended. I got the smaller size to start but I'll be back for the full-size soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very similar to Elizabeth & James Nirvana Black, which I loved and was sad to see discontinued. Very warm and woodsy, but not overtly masculine.

reviews.review_title: Elegant, Sensual & Long Lasting...and Clean too!?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW gorgeous inside and outside! I found this beautiful, sophisticated fragrance through experimenting with the Henry Rose sampling set. This is hands down my favorite scent: creamy and sensual, with a very elegant finish. I was a loyal Chanel fragrance user until I discovered that clean beauty was really important to me. Truly, this is the first fragrance that delivers on elegance and longevity, while being a safe and clean formulation. THANK YOU Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received my purchase of the mini size.  Did not read reviews this time but purchased on the composition.  I cannot get any neroli scent nor any fresh.  Find this too overbearing for me and I've only put it on my tester paper. Certainly not a scent to impose on co-workers so will give it at least a chance when I work alone. This is a heavy  warm scent that announces your presence.

reviews.review_title: Inconsistent: sample was different from bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in the Henry Rose set and ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT! I finished the sample bottle quickly and ordered the travel bottle but it smells so different and I don’t know why. The sample smelled a lot better. Not sure if the new bottle I got is faulty but it also looked like it was used? So sad about this because I truly loved the sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind purchase from reading reviews and I am so glad I bought it. This warm woody scent is unique and is for those who aren't afraid to get stopped and asked what are you wearing, and if you want to make an unforgettable impression when you walk into a room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i cant get enough of this. its definitely a divisive and unique scent. it has a heavy green note, freshness, some woodiness, a slight note of what could be described as “metallic.” it is stunning. i have never smelled anything like it. definitely worth trying a small size to see if its for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s hard to describe this scent. It’s fresh without being clean, floral without being overly so, and ever so slightly woody, but in a sweet sandalwood way. I will say that it needs time to age before it has any  longevity so it will need to age for a month before it last longer than an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this based off the reviews hoping it would be as great as the reviews said it was and for me it was an immediate no.  I love super clean , woody ,green and Earthy type of scents. I was looking for something fresh and clean. This was not it.  My body chemistry is extremely picky , I wish I could wear all the influencer suggested fragrances but I simply cannot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is an incredible vanilla sandalwood base with a sharp green top and the freshest heart of freesia. A very contrary but pleasant scent. Not complex. Just beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful green woody fragrance. Not overly complex but great for a spring scent. Minimal to moderate projection, crowd pleasing scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this, got sick of after a few months so gonna take a break and come back to it but definitely a special scent.

reviews.review_title: not an every day fragrance, but good enough
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent can definitely be overpowering and headache-inducing, so I always do a max total of 3 sprays directly to my neck and chest and that's it. It definitely has staying power, even on skin. It's not a fragrance I would reach for every day, but definitely nice for a casual date night.

reviews.review_title: Terrible headache So bummed this is a dud for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for myself early September and it was just horrible. I wore it like 4 times, trying to convince myself that it was good, but it gave me a terrible headache every time. Twice I had to change my clothes because my head hurt so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much, I feel it is the perfect unique nighttime scent. If you like sweet or floral scents only then this may not be for you but this is my favorite perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous spicy scent that lasts all day on me without being overpowering. There’s a subtle sweetness and warmth as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance and I’m glad I did. I love this fragrance. It makes me feel warm and cozy. I can’t wait to try more from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly fell in love with this scent and I wish I could just bathe in it! Upon immediate application there is a fresh, woody, and kind of spicy scent to it but with undertones of sweetness…it is hard to explain, it draws you in. As the perfume drys down and plays with your body chemistry there is a warm sweet velvety side to the scent that comes out and stays with you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unique and lovely scent!  I like this one for cooler months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty!!! I got this for my mom & it smells so good on her. And on me too! It’s a powdery woody musk, mostly sits close to the skin but has a little projection to people sitting very close to you. Lasts 3-4 hours on the skin, lingers a little longer with moisturized skin. My trick is to use a thick lotion then dab some vaseline onto pulse points (wrists, inside elbows, behind ears, neck) and then spray perfume. Don’t rub your wrists together or anything, just let it do its magic as is. Excited to try others from Henry Rose now!

reviews.review_title: She’s a queen and she’s a monster 😜
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my signature scent. It is so so perfect and smells sweet, sexy, and woody. I’m intoxicated and in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the only perfume I have ever returned. it's sickening. I don't even know how to describe this. I think I detected notes of Vicks vapor rub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells sooo similar to Tom Ford Metallique. Weird since they dont have the same notes. This is: Sweet, spicy, clean, soapy, metallic, it’s a chameleon of a scent!￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love this sent, it’s sweet, soft and creamy. Beautiful warm floral sandalwood. I’ve tried all from there sampler set and this one is my favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: there is a very noticeable Hot Pepper note in this fragrance, like a Jalapeño Pepper note.  It is so off-putting.  I tried to get past it but I couldn't.  I can't believe this fragrance has the high ratings it does.  Does nobody else smell this??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love this perfume but I can see why it would be very polarizing. I didn’t like it at first but it’s grown on me. Definitely smell in store or try the travel size before blind buying. It’s very heavy/rich, I get mostly a warm/sandalwood scent with a bit of lightness almost? A bit of floral but not much. It’s very unique! I always pair it with a vanilla lotion to tone down the heaviness. The best part of this perfume is the lasting power. Perfumes usually only stay for like an 1hr max on me, but this one lasts for 6+ hours. It’s very strong and projects, I can actively smell it the entire time I’m wearing it, even when I’m not trying too. Which I love. It’s a really good quality perfume, it just depends on if you like the scent or not.

reviews.review_title: Not my scent but if you like it, it stays well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume started very sweet (I got strong marshmallow notes) which is not usually my favorite scent family. It did eventually dry down and mellow to a more musky/vanilla/floral scent on my skin. It's definitely a more unique fragrance than I've encountered lately and the staying power is good, so it deserves a few stars. But even after drying down it still screams I'm wearing perfume! not what is that lovely scent? if that makes any sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this. It immediately goes on with a brace of greenness (the petitgrain), but settles into a creamy, musky floral citrus. I love love love perfume and have a ton, and find this to be a very unique cent and something perfect for summer and fall. I also find it to be long-lasting, which I appreciate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous rich creamy green vanilla/sandalwood scent! Will work for all seasons and smells so unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful sandalwood sent very intoxicating but unfortunately can only smell it for about 30 minutes are used a whole travel size atomizer within an hour!   It is skin scent. Unfort

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own 6 different Henry Rose perfumes. I love all of them but this is my absolute favorite. The fragrance is long lasting and smells divine. I receive many compliments all the time. I always have a backup with this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product as a complimentary from Henry rose in exchange for my honest opinion.I m in love with this fragrance and use it everyday.Scent lasts longer and has received so many compliments .Highly recommend for daily use.

Gifted by Henry Rose. The Queens & Monsters Eau De Parfum is an amazing fragrance. The scent is a harmonious blend of sophistication and intrigue, exuding a sense of feeling elegance. The fragrance opens with a burst of vibrant citrus notes, which gracefully give way to a seductive floral heart, and finally settles into a warm, sensual base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been guilty of only wearing one perfume for years so I have been trying to branch out, especially since I found Henry Rose Queens & Monsters.  The bottle is beautiful and it smells amazing! It may be the only perfume I wear for coming years...gifted by henryrose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like a spicy, musky unisex fragrance this is for you! It wears well and evolves throughout the day with good staying power. I love that Henry Rose fragrances are clean and free of phthalates and parabens. Gifted by henryrose.

reviews.review_title: Love how amazing it smells on me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time wearing Henry Rose, and I am in love! I received the perfume complimentary from Henry Rose and I am not disappointed. I tend to not be adventurous with my fragrances, and I usually stick to the same ones. However, I am so glad that Queens & Monsters is a bit different than what I am used to. I’ve received so many compliments, and I absolutely adore how well the scent pairs with my body chemistry. Overall, I’ll continue to wear this fragrance and may even explore some of the others from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose, Henry Rose Queens & Monsters Eau de Parfum, in exchange for my honest opinion. I was hesitant at first because of the tops notes being Violet Leaf, Neroli & Petitgrain. One of the last ones is Sandalwood. Some I've never heard of and others I'm not fond of.  I was wrong!! This scent is absolutely enticing. Warm vanilla and the main note I smell.  The only thing I don't like, is it doesn't last long. I spray it on prior to leaving for work and by the time I get to work, I can no longer smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my top favorite fragrances from the line! This beautiful floral fragrance has notes of rose, tuber rose and deep earthy notes. It’s such a beautiful rich and feminine scent. Perfect for the Floral lover. Gifted by Henry Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this whole brand recently and I especially love this scent Queens & Monsters , it's sweet but not too sweet, soft and feminine! It's really beautiful and makes my day better getting whips of it on myself! Def one to be tried from this brand ! Gifted by Henry Rose. Opinions my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Henry Rose eau de parfum, gifted by Henry Rose, smells sooo delicious! It’s a light, airy fragrance. Upon praying you get this deep smell of coconut and vanilla! Only a few sprays can lasts hours and have gotten so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry rose.  Amazing quality, and smells amazing! The bottle is so unique and modern absolutely looks amazing sitting on my vanity. The fragrance smells so good, and last for days. I sprayed it on a cardigan and hung it up and I can still smell it every time I open my closet!! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a warm and woodsy smelling scent from henry rose, I like the mild sandalwood smell which feels seductive and also classy! This lasts long and love the packaging ! Its best for winter and evenings! Gifted by henry rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I totally get the name. There's this seductively sweet and frolicky floral side but also brings forth this deeper, richer, and woody side. This has incredible longevity, sets a romantic aura, and offers this undescribable sexy mood for anyone who wears this. When I did the fragrance finder on their website, it pointed me to this very perfume. I love all the perfumes that I have tried from Henry Rose. Each one fits all of my many moods, but this one is the best so far. This is one that I will be wearing all year long. Gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: For you, him, her, them, they
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, I'd never heard of this brand of perfume before. I was gifted by henryrose this amazing bottle. Before it arrived I did some research and was surprised to see that it's from one of the actresses I feel is a real person. Michelle Pfeiffer comes across during interviews as someone who understands normal day to day life, she just happens to be Hollywood royalty. Keeping this in mind once the package arrived, I was completely blown away by the complex simplicity of this fragrance. When you first smell it you're not sure what, where, how, why, who?! It's so subtly in your face. Yes, that is a contradiction but so is this perfume. It's masculine yet feminine. Gently strong. It lives up to everything you expect from a unisex fragrance. I am extremely feminine and it totally worked for me. To confirm my suspicion that even a very masculine person could pull it off, I asked my husband to use it one work day. He said people kept complimenting him on how he smelled. Same reaction I received. What was really fun was the day we both wore it. Others could tell our fragrance was similar, but never believing it was the same one. It totally works with ANY pH. Highly recommend this perfume. An overall great buy, not to mention a wonderful company. A+

reviews.review_title: That name! Such a sophisticated fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one is the edgy, sophisticated fragrance from Henry Rose. It was sent to me complimentary from the brand. I can see why it's referred to as genderless. It's divine and so lush for anyone who uses it! I absolutely love this fragrance! It's definitely not an everyday scent for me because I feel I have to be dressed appropriately for it, if you know what mean. It's a sultry fragrance that reels you in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose! I am a perfume lover and I am always eager to try new new perfumes. This has the woody notes of neroli, freesia, and sandalwood which I loved the most. Every time I wear this perfume, my husband  comments are, “Wow, how good you smell!” I spritz this on my pulse points, wrist, neck, and below the ears. It gives dreamy freshness every time I wear it. This scent stays long and is perfect to wear for all occasions. Overall, I loved it much and this will be a great addition to my perfume collection.

# Gifted by Henry Rose, and I'm in love with the package. Love from the first sight. Also, I love the ingredients. Smells good not too hursh and last for the whole day. Definitely one of my favorite perfumes on the shelf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. This was honestly my least favorite but it may be due to personal preference. It has a very earthy smell which is not my forte. I will say it is a potent smells and lasts while so that’s good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the smell because it is warm and woodsy. The freesia is quite prominent so keep that in mind. The scent last all day and isn’t overpowering. Overall a great neutral scent for everyday use. This was gifted to me in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose. The queens in monster EDP is very potent smelling. It is long lasting. I love the woody and spicy notes. I smell the sandalwood, which is my favorite. It is very relaxing to smell. I love the dry down and how it smelled at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Opens green, but if you are not a fan of green scents don't let that fool you because within a minute it transitions into a warm cozy powdery tonka bean scent  with no trace of the green opening and it's so lovely.There is no tonka bean in this scent its a vanilla, cocomusk and sandlewood that blends very nicely where you do not smell sharp vanilla in the middle, but the dry down becomes mostly vanilla with  some sandlewood on me. I received this scent complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Henry Rose Queens & Monsters  in exchange for my honest review. I wear this Earthy & Woody scent whenever I feel a bit naughty and it brings attention to me! So much so that I wear it less often. I love the fact that the bottles are made from recycled glass plus the cap and cartons are 100% compostable. I highly recommend this perfume by Henry Rose!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose! This perfume smells amazing and had a long-lasting power. It’s basically an explosion of flower scent that’s very flattering and perfect for any season of the year. I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to wear this perfume daily to work. It has a nice and lasting scent that’s perfect for daily and long-time use. I don’t have to reapply it frequently throughout the day so it is a much better value than my last fragrance purchase. This was a nice introduction to an amazing brand! Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this unique scent! It starts out so different than when I wear it and then changes into such an amazing scent! Love having this in my collection! It’s such a warm and cozy feeling when I wear it! Gifted by Henry and Rose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, it's very sophisticated and you only need to wear a little, it lasts all day. It has become one of my favorite perfumes. It is perfect for special occasions, it makes me feel very happy. This was gifted by HenryRose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: received this complimentary from Henry Rose. Really nice package, beautiful bottle. Smells soo good, its unisex but for me it smells more masculine. I wish the scent last longer, so you need to reapply during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product was gifted by Henry Rose to review. It’s a woody scent. The scent felt warm and soft. I can also smell the sweetness from it. It’s would be great for fall and winter time.  Very long lasting on me. Love the packaging. Overall, I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume dries down as a spicy vanilla musk on me. The vanilla is a little stronger than I prefer in a perfume, but my sister absolutely loves the notes and this is hands down her favorite perfume. The scent lasts about 4 to 6 hours before nearly being impossible to smell. I received this complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I feel this truly reads as a gender-neutral fragrance that is not season-specific. I have already had a couple people ask what I am wearing. Even after a night of wearing this, I still smell it on my clothes the next day. In comparison to other fragrances in my fragrance collection, I find the olfactory profile of this particular one to be more memorable/unique, yet not overly-complex. It wears like a high-end, fine fragrance. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received complimentary from Henry Rose. Queens & Monsters feels so unique to me, it opens with this fabulous green note but soon the flowery notes of Jasmine, Freesia and Neroli take over, the dry down is spectacular, the Vanilla note is beautiful and gives it a warmth, and sweetness that complements the soft sensual Sandalwood to perfection! The longevity is medium to high which is amazing for a clean perfume, most I've tried don't last more than 4 to 5 hrs while this perfume lasts me 7 to 8 hrs and even longer on clothes. The projection is medium and during drydown feels more personal, although is marketed as a unisex fragrance it doesn't lean masculine at all. It's a beautiful well crafted scent that smells niche and expensive! A must try!

reviews.review_title: New favorite scent that lasts all day!

reviews.review_text: (Gifted by Henry Rose)  I’ve received the Henry Rose perfume (Queens & Monsters) and it has become one of my new favorite perfumes! Not only the scent is good, different and unique, but Henry Rose is so thoughtful that they add a guide chart of possible perfume layerings. I thought that was genius! That gives you many options to make your perfume so for you! Truly captivating!   Package is so beautiful and minimalistic; describes how package was made and clearly states ingredients in perfume. Really loved that! Also, scent is very unique and lasts very long! I loved the lovely hint of vanilla and how cozy it makes me feel.   I wore it when I went out for brunch with my mom and received many compliments!   Definitely my new #1.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The one that I received complimentary from Henryrose is Queens & Monsters Eau De Parfum. Oh my god , I really love the scent. I’m so glad that I choose the right one , I even spray some in my car and it is full of the Queens & Monsters scent , plus it lasts for long . I also like the lovely packing itself .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time ever trying this brand’s perfume and I don’t know where I like it or not yet. I’ve been using it every other day for over a week now and I can’t seem to decide. I think this scent is more of a 30s and up audience. It’s a beautiful earthy, woody, and sexy scent but I think I just prefer something sweet, clean and light. However, I am keeping it for certain days I wanna switch up. gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG I’ve never loved perfume so much literally I’m in love with “queens and monsters” from Henry Rose. The scene is so unique, fresh and long lasting. I can’t even describe it because whoever I asked they all describe it differently but everyone live it. I am so glad I was gifted by Henry rose in exchange of my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t blind buy this… smells in person in your body first.   Queens and monsters is a bold, daring fragrance that is perfect for those who want to make a statement. It features a powerful blend of sweet and spicy notes starting with a top note of sweet vanilla that is quickly followed by a kick of black pepper, adding a spicy and smoky depth. This is followed by a heart of yelling yelling, and Jasmine, which adds a floral and powdery sweetness finally the fragrance settles into a warm base of sandalwood and benzoin, adding a rich and woody depth. This was gifted to me by Henry Rose for review and testing purposes. Conclusion: You will definitely stand out from the crowd and make a statement. It is strong and it is different. I do suggest you don’t blind buy this online and test it out in person on your body before making a commitment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a bit of a perfume junkie and lately I have been trying out new brands and notes that I had not previously been exposed to.  Queens and Monsters starts off a bit greener than the notes would suggest, with a nice sandlewood peeking through almost immediately. Next, I get Neroli, Jasmine, and Vanilla. This scent is blended so beautifully, and the fragrance is really captivating. I have gotten stopped several times each day that I have worn this. My boyfriend loves when I wear a drop to bed, also.  It has a decent sillage -- others will smell this. In my opinion, it is a bit too much for the office, but perfect for an evening out or social gathering.  I can smell this on my jacket the next day, so it absolutely lasts. Definitely a new favorite!   Gifted by Henry Rose, but opinion is entirely my own.

This is such a GORGEOUS scent. I am obsessed with how powdery and feminine it is. It lasts a really long time too. Great job by Michelle Pfeiffer! I recommend for any aged woman. Gifted by Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose!! This scent is addicting. It’s the perfect combination of fresh/a little green, woody, and floral. The vanilla helps balance everything out and adds such a yummy quality. This scent is long lasting and appropriate for any time of day or year.

reviews.review_title: Too strong, earthy and green for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Queens & Monsters is a bit too earthy for my liking. I generally like woody, but the petitgrain and neroli notes are too green, citrus-forward and earthy for me. It gives that earthy spice that I absolutely cannot stand in a fragrance. Although there are floral and woody notes too, the earthy ones are too overbearing for me and lean pretty masculine. Too me, this comes off very strong and not in a good way. Sad to say this one did not work out for me. Complimentary from Henry Rose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love how beautiful it is this bottle very aesthetically looking. Also the smell is kind a sweet but at the same time i can say it is fresh for me. I recommend it. Gifted by Henry rose to review . Thanks

reviews.review_title: Not A Go To For Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Henry Rose in exchange for my review. Honestly this scent was a no go for me. To me it smells too much like cut grass, overly “green” scented and not in a good way. I physically couldn’t wear it without feeling like throwing up every time I got a waft of it. For me, the base notes never really reflected through and it kept the same green scent the whole time. I do not recommend.

Definitely a complex and interesting play of scents to this one. I like it best once I’ve had it on for a couple of hours. Note: The Henry Rose packaging is A+. The bottle is so simple and pretty—the brand name is actually on the back of the bottle while the fragrance name and other text are on the front; it’s a really cool effect when you hold the bottle in your hands. Gifted by Henry Rose.

I spritz one squirt on my wrist and one on my neck and that’s all I need for the day. The scent isn’t overwhelming or strong, it’s soft and lovely, and I look forward to wearing it every day.
